Competitive expense ratio for specialized dividend ETF

Distribution may include return of capital

SCHP.underlying_assets: Bloomberg US Treasury Inflation-Protected Notes (TIPS) index

DBMF.fund_name: iMGP DBi Managed Futures Strategy ETF

BTAL.fund_name: AGF U.S. Market Neutral Anti-Beta Fund

key_characteristics: Higher expense ratio due to active management

MERFX.underlying_assets: Companies involved in announced mergers, acquisitions, tender offers, leveraged buyouts, spin-offs

Sector allocation: Retail (13.3%), Healthcare (13.1%), Telecom Tower (11.6%)

UTF.underlying_assets: Infrastructure companies - utilities, pipelines, toll roads, airports, railroads, ports, telecommunications

financial_modeling_prep_api.description: Financial Modeling Prep provides comprehensive financial data API with real-time stock prices, financial statements, and ETF/mutual fund data
financial_modeling_prep_api.authentication: API key required - append ?apikey=YOUR_API_KEY to every request

etf_endpoints.name: ETF Holdings
etf_endpoints.description: Detailed holdings of a specific ETF including constituent stocks, shares held, and weight percentages

etf_endpoints.name: ETF List
etf_endpoints.description: Find symbols for any ETF, including Name, Symbol, Exchange, and Price

etf_endpoints.name: ETF Info
etf_endpoints.description: ETF general information including expense ratio, assets under management, sector allocations

mutual_fund_endpoints.name: Mutual Fund Disclosures
mutual_fund_endpoints.description: Detailed holdings and disclosure data for mutual funds and ETFs by quarter and year

mutual_fund_endpoints.name: Fund Country Allocation
mutual_fund_endpoints.description: Geographic distribution of assets within funds

mutual_fund_endpoints.name: Fund Asset Exposure
mutual_fund_endpoints.description: Specific stock holdings within ETFs and mutual funds

general_endpoints.name: Company Profile
general_endpoints.description: Comprehensive company overview including price, beta, market cap, description

general_endpoints.name: Quote
general_endpoints.description: Real-time stock quotes with bid/ask prices, volume, last trade price

general_endpoints.name: Income Statement
general_endpoints.description: Annual and quarterly income statement data

general_endpoints.name: Balance Sheet
general_endpoints.description: Balance sheet data showing assets, liabilities, shareholder equity

general_endpoints.name: Cash Flow Statement
general_endpoints.description: Cash flow data categorized into Operating, Investing, and Financing

json_response_structure.description: Primary format - hierarchical key-value pairs, may include nested objects/arrays

csv_format.description: Flat format suitable for spreadsheet analysis - rows as records, columns as fields
csv_format.note: Available for most endpoints by modifying request format

nested_data_handling.description: Some responses contain nested objects requiring flattening for analysis
nested_data_handling.recommendation: Use json_normalize() in pandas or custom flattening functions

rate_limits_and_access.premium_tiers: Higher request limits and additional data

best_practices: Validate JSON responses for completeness before processing
Use flattening techniques for nested JSON structures
Respect rate limits and terms of service
Cache frequently accessed data to minimize API calls
Handle API errors gracefully with proper error checking

api_coverage.etf_data_available: Yes - comprehensive holdings, performance, and structural data
api_coverage.mutual_fund_data_available: Yes - disclosure data, holdings, and geographic allocations
api_coverage.real_time_quotes: Yes - for all publicly traded instruments
api_coverage.historical_data: Yes - financial statements, price history, and performance metrics

research_summary.data_completeness: High - all major portfolio instruments have sufficient data for dashboard analysis
